# Smart Roof Pricing - Northeast Mississippi's Trusted Roofing Experts

> Professional roofing contractor serving Tupelo and surrounding areas in Northeast Mississippi. We provide free, instant roofing estimates powered by AI analysis of 50,000+ roofing projects.

## About Us

Smart Roof Pricing is a family-owned roofing company based in Tupelo, Mississippi, serving Northeast Mississippi since 2010. We specialize in residential roofing services including roof replacement, repair, inspection, and storm damage restoration.

## Services

- **Roof Replacement**: Complete tear-off and installation of new roofing systems. $8,000 - $25,000 typical range. 1-3 days completion.
- **Roof Repair**: Fix leaks, damaged shingles, and other roofing issues. $300 - $3,000 typical range. Same day to 1 day.
- **Roof Inspection**: Professional assessment of roof condition with detailed reports. $150 - $400. 1-2 hours.
- **Gutters & Drainage**: Seamless gutter installation, repair, and gutter guards. $1,000 - $5,000.
- **Roof Maintenance**: Preventive care programs to extend roof lifespan. $200 - $500/year.
- **Emergency Repair**: 24/7 emergency response for storm damage and urgent issues.
